SQL_w_share: f'INSERT INTO {table_name} (report_date, year, bonus, increase, dividend, record_date, xrdr_date, share_date) VALUES (`{report_date}`, {year}, {bonus}, {increase}, {dividend}, `{record_date}`, `{xrdr}`, `{share}`)'
SQL_wo_share: f'INSERT INTO {table_name} (report_date, year, bonus, increase, dividend, record_date, xrdr_date) VALUES (`{report_date}`, {year}, {bonus}, {increase}, {dividend}, `{record_date}`, `{xrdr}`)'
